title: Peruse Tutorial: An placeholder for better documentation

description: This is an example book, intended for presentation with the Peruse framework. Don't let it's simplicity fool you: it demonstrates all of the features of peruse, so you should be able to copy and modify any of its content to help you write your book.
acknowledgements: Thanks to Boomy for all her hard work.

references.latoza20: Thomas D. LaToza, Maryam Arab, Dastyni Loksa, Amy J. Ko (2020). [Explicit Programming Strategies|http://faculty.washington.edu/ajko/papers/Latoza2020ExplicitProgrammingStrategies.pdf]. Empirical Software Engineering.
register20: Learning machine learning with personal data helps stakeholders ground advocacy arguments in model mechanics
Finds that teaching machine learning by tracing an algorithm with learners' personal data increases the extent to which they can identify bias in self-advocacy arguments.
references.druga21: Stefania Druga, Amy J. Ko (2021). How Do Childrenâ€™s Perceptions of Machine Intelligence Change when Training & Coding Smart Programs? ACM Interaction Design for Children.

gloss.definition: An alphabetical list of terms or words found in or relating to a specific subject, text, or dialect, with explanations; a brief dictionary.
